name: EX-DETECTIVES
description:
EARLY ACCESS - FREE

Ex-Detectives is a co-op brawler inspired by the classic arcade games Double Dragon and Final Fight. Take on a gang of kidnappers as a pair of hard-boiled vigilantes who traded their badges for baseball bats.

Features:

  • Classic brawler gameplay in modern 3D
  • Two player co-op
  • Combo scoring and leaderboards
  • Coin-op mode (for arcade cabinets)
